questions.text: The Virtual DOM in React is a lightweight copy of the real DOM used to improve performance.
In React, props can be modified inside the child component.
The useEffect hook can be used to perform side effects such as data fetching or DOM manipulation.
React Context API is used to pass data through the component tree without using props manually at every level.
Keys in React lists help identify which elements have changed, but using array indexes as keys is always recommended.
